create_current_OpenWeather
func:
msg.topic = `
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weather_current_ow (
  timestamp     TEXT ,
  latitude      REAL,
  longitude     REAL, 
  city_name     TEXT,
  city_code    TEXT,
  temperature   REAL,
  humidity      REAL,
  uv_index      REAL,
  wind_speed    REAL,
  wind_dir      REAL,
  wind_gust     REAL,
  weathercode   INTEGER,
  pressure      REAL,
  sunrise       TEXT,
  sunset        TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (timestamp,latitude,longitude)
);
`;

return msg;

name: create_forecast_OpenWeather
func:
msg.topic = `
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weather_forecast_ow (
  ts_utc        TEXT,
  latitude      REAL,
  longitude     REAL,                    -- time of API call
  forecast_day  TEXT,                   -- YYYY-MM-DD (of the day being forecast)
  city_name     TEXT,
  city_code     TEXT,
  temp_max      REAL,
  temp_min      REAL,
  humidity      REAL,
  uv_index      REAL,
  pop           REAL,                   -- probability of precipitation
  weathercode   INTEGER,
  sunrise       TEXT,
  sunset        TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (ts_utc, forecast_day,latitude,longitude)
);
`;

return msg;

name: create_past_OpenMeteo
func:
msg.topic = `
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weather_climate_history(
  date_utc   TEXT, 
  lat_round  REAL, 
  lon_round  REAL, 
  city_name  TEXT,
  city_code  TEXT,
  temp_max   REAL,
  temp_min   REAL,
  temp_mean  REAL,
  data_points REAL,
  PRIMARY KEY(date_utc, lat_round, lon_round)
);
`;

return msg;

name: create_current_OpenMeteo
func:
msg.topic = `
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weather_current_om (
  timestamp               TEXT,
  latitude                REAL,
  longitude               REAL,
  city_name               TEXT,
  city_code               TEXT,
  temperature_2m          REAL,
  relative_humidity_2m    REAL,
  apparent_temperature    REAL,
  is_day                  INTEGER,
  precipitation           REAL,
  rain                    REAL,
  showers                 REAL,
  snowfall                REAL,
  weather_code            INTEGER,
  cloud_cover             REAL,
  pressure_msl            REAL,
  surface_pressure        REAL,
  wind_speed_10m          REAL,
  wind_direction_10m      REAL,
  wind_gusts_10m          REAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (timestamp,latitude,longitude)
);
`;

return msg;

name: create_threshold_table

CREATE TABLE eq_events (
    quake_id        TEXT PRIMARY KEY,   
    ts_utc          TEXT,               
    last_update_utc TEXT,               
    lat             REAL,              
    lon             REAL,               
    depth_km        REAL,              
    magnitude       REAL,               
    mag_type        TEXT,               
    region          TEXT,                
    ev_type         TEXT,               
    auth            TEXT,                
    source_id       TEXT,               
    source_catalog  TEXT,             
    src             TEXT,
    felt            INTEGER,
    significance    INTEGER               
);


`;

return msg;

function 1
func:
// Create the weather_codes lookup table (code ‚Üí short text)
msg.topic = ` SELECT 
    overall_aqi,
    pm2_5, pm10, no2, so2, o3, co,
    pm2_5_aqi, pm10_aqi, no2_aqi, so2_aqi, o3_aqi, co_aqi,
    uv_index, 
    alder_pollen, birch_pollen, grass_pollen, olive_pollen, ragweed_pollen,
    source,
    ROUND((julianday('now') - julianday(ts_utc)) * 24, 1) as hours_ago
  FROM air_data 
  WHERE ROUND(latitude,3) =  38.369 AND ROUND(longitude,3) =  26.137
  ORDER BY ts_utc DESC LIMIT 1
`;
return msg;

name: format status
Command message
func:
// Enhanced help/commands message
msg.payload = {
    chatId: msg.chatId,
    type: 'message',
    content:
        'ü§ñ *Welcome to Jarvis!*\n\n' +
        'üìç **Location Commands**\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/pin` ‚Äì Share your GPS location\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/loc athens` ‚Äì Set location by city name\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/loc london uk` ‚Äì Include country code\n\n' +
        'üîç **Search & Info**\n' +
         '‚Ä¢ `/status` ‚Äì gives back info for the place\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/find coffee` ‚Äì Find nearby coffee shops\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/find hospital` ‚Äì Find emergency services\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/traffic` ‚Äì Check traffic incidents\n\n' +
        '‚öôÔ∏è **Smart Settings**\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/set temp_high 35` ‚Äì Hot weather alert at 35¬∞C\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/set quake_mag 4.0` ‚Äì Earthquake alerts for 4.0+\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/limits` ‚Äì View your current settings\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `/config` ‚Äì See all available options\n\n' +
        'üí° *Tip: Just type* `/help` *anytime for this menu*',
    options: { parse_mode: 'Markdown' }
};
return msg;

name: threshold message
func:
// Enhanced config message with better earthquake settings explanation
msg.payload = {
    chatId: msg.chatId,
    type: 'message',
    content:
        '‚öôÔ∏è *Available Settings*\n\n' +
        
        'üå°Ô∏è **Weather Alerts**\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `temp_high` ‚Äì Hot weather alert (¬∞C)\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `temp_low` ‚Äì Cold weather alert (¬∞C)\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `aqi_limit` ‚Äì Air quality alert threshold\n\n' +
        
        'üåç **Earthquake Alerts**\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `quake_mag` ‚Äì Local earthquake magnitude *(4.5)*\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `quake_radius` ‚Äì Alert radius in km *(100)*\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `global_quake_mag` ‚Äì Global major earthquake *(7.0)*\n' +
        '  _Get alerts for big earthquakes worldwide_\n\n' +
        
        'üöó **Traffic & Search**\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `traffic_severity` ‚Äì Traffic alert level 1-5 *(3)*\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `search_radius` ‚Äì Search radius in km *(3)*\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `search_limit` ‚Äì Max results to show *(5)*\n\n' +
        
        'üåø **Health & Environment**\n' +
        '‚Ä¢ `pollen_limit` ‚Äì Pollen alert threshold\n\n' +
        
        '**Examples:**\n' +
        '`/set quake_mag 4.0` ‚Äì Alert for 4.0+ quakes nearby\n' +
        '`/set quake_radius 50` ‚Äì Monitor 50km radius\n' +
        '`/set global_quake 6.5` ‚Äì Global alerts for 6.5+\n' +
        '`/limits` ‚Äì View your current settings\n\n' +
        
        '_Default values shown in italics_ üéØ',
    options: { parse_mode: 'Markdown' }
};
return msg;

AIR_QUA_NINJA_API

function 22
func:
// full JSON from Ninjas
const p = msg.payload;
const ts = new Date().toISOString();
const lat = global.get('user_lat') ?? 37.9838;
const lon = global.get('user_lon') ?? 23.7275;
const city = global.get('city_name')    || '';
const ctry = global.get('country_code') || '';

msg.topic = `
INSERT INTO air_data
  (ts_utc, latitude, longitude, city_name, city_code, source,
   overall_aqi,
   pm2_5, pm10, co, o3, no2, so2,
   pm2_5_aqi, pm10_aqi, co_aqi, o3_aqi, no2_aqi, so2_aqi)
VALUES
  ('${ts}', ${lat}, ${lon}, '${city}', '${ctry}', 'api_ninjas',
   ${p.overall_aqi},
   ${p["PM2.5"].concentration}, ${p.PM10.concentration},
   ${p.CO.concentration},      ${p.O3.concentration},
   ${p.NO2.concentration},     ${p.SO2.concentration},
   ${p["PM2.5"].aqi}, ${p.PM10.aqi},
   ${p.CO.aqi},      ${p.O3.aqi},
   ${p.NO2.aqi},     ${p.SO2.aqi})
ON CONFLICT(ts_utc, latitude, longitude, source) DO UPDATE SET
   overall_aqi   = excluded.overall_aqi,
   pm2_5         = excluded.pm2_5,
   pm10          = excluded.pm10,
   co            = excluded.co,
   o3            = excluded.o3,
   no2           = excluded.no2,
   so2           = excluded.so2,
   pm2_5_aqi     = excluded.pm2_5_aqi,
   pm10_aqi      = excluded.pm10_aqi,
   co_aqi        = excluded.co_aqi,
   o3_aqi        = excluded.o3_aqi,
   no2_aqi       = excluded.no2_aqi,
   so2_aqi       = excluded.so2_aqi;

`;

return msg;

name: function 23
function 24
func:
/**************************************************************************
 * Open-Meteo AQ + pollen  (today + 4-day forecast, hourly)
 * Emits ONE msg per row ‚Üí sqlite node writes all 120 without errors.
 **************************************************************************/

const h     = msg.payload.hourly;
const offset = msg.payload.utc_offset_seconds ?? 0;
const lat   = global.get('user_lat')  ?? 37.9838;
const lon   = global.get('user_lon') ?? 23.7275;
const city  = global.get('city_name')    || '';
const ctry  = global.get('country_code') || '';
const toUtcOpenMeteo = (localIso, offsetSec) =>
  new Date(Date.parse(localIso) - offsetSec * 1000).toISOString();

for (let i = 0; i < h.time.length; i++) {
  const ts = toUtcOpenMeteo(h.time[i], msg.payload.utc_offset_seconds);

  const sql = `
INSERT INTO air_data
  (ts_utc, latitude, longitude, city_name, city_code, source,
   overall_aqi,
   pm2_5, pm10, dust,
   no2, so2, o3,
   ch4, nh3, co2,
   uv_index, uv_index_clear_sky, aod,
   alder_pollen, birch_pollen, grass_pollen,
   mugwort_pollen, olive_pollen, ragweed_pollen)
VALUES
  ('${ts}', ${lat}, ${lon}, '${city}', '${ctry}', 'openmeteo',
   ${h.overall_aqi?.[i]        ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.pm2_5?.[i]              ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.pm10?.[i]               ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.dust?.[i]               ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.nitrogen_dioxide?.[i]   ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.sulphur_dioxide?.[i]    ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.ozone?.[i]              ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.methane?.[i]            ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.ammonia?.[i]            ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.carbon_dioxide?.[i]     ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.uv_index?.[i]           ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.uv_index_clear_sky?.[i] ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.aerosol_optical_depth?.[i] ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.alder_pollen?.[i]       ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.birch_pollen?.[i]       ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.grass_pollen?.[i]       ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.mugwort_pollen?.[i]     ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.olive_pollen?.[i]       ?? 'NULL'},
   ${h.ragweed_pollen?.[i]     ?? 'NULL'})
ON CONFLICT(ts_utc, latitude, longitude, source) DO UPDATE SET
   overall_aqi           = excluded.overall_aqi,
   pm2_5                 = excluded.pm2_5,
   pm10                  = excluded.pm10,
   dust                  = excluded.dust,
   no2                   = excluded.no2,
   so2                   = excluded.so2,
   o3                    = excluded.o3,
   ch4                   = excluded.ch4,
   nh3                   = excluded.nh3,
   co2                   = excluded.co2,
   uv_index              = excluded.uv_index,
   uv_index_clear_sky    = excluded.uv_index_clear_sky,
   aod                   = excluded.aod,
   alder_pollen          = excluded.alder_pollen,
   birch_pollen          = excluded.birch_pollen,
   grass_pollen          = excluded.grass_pollen,
   mugwort_pollen        = excluded.mugwort_pollen,
   olive_pollen          = excluded.olive_pollen,
   ragweed_pollen        = excluded.ragweed_pollen;
`;

  // emit this INSERT as its own message
  node.send({ topic: sql });
}

// nothing to return; we‚Äôve sent all rows
return null;

name: INSERT_WEATHER_CURRENT_OW
func:
/*****************************************************************
 * Expected msg.payload from:
 *   https://api.openweathermap.org/data/3.0/onecall?exclude=minutely,hourly,daily,alerts
 *****************************************************************/
const c = msg.payload.current;
if (!c) { node.warn('OW missing current'); return null; }

const ts = new Date(c.dt * 1000).toISOString();
const lat = global.get('user_lat') ?? 37.9838;
const lon = global.get('user_lon') ?? 23.7275;
const city = global.get('city_name') || '';
const ctry = global.get('country_code') || '';

msg.topic = `
INSERT INTO weather_current_ow
  (timestamp, latitude, longitude, city_name, city_code,
   temperature, humidity, uv_index,
   wind_speed, wind_dir, wind_gust,
   weathercode, pressure, sunrise, sunset)
VALUES
  ('${ts}', ${lat}, ${lon}, '${city}', '${ctry}',
   ${c.temp}, ${c.humidity}, ${c.uvi},
   ${c.wind_speed}, ${c.wind_deg}, ${c.wind_gust ?? 'NULL'},
   ${c.weather[0].id}, ${c.pressure},
   '${new Date(c.sunrise * 1000).toISOString()}',
   '${new Date(c.sunset * 1000).toISOString()}')
ON CONFLICT(timestamp,latitude,longitude) DO UPDATE SET
   latitude   = excluded.latitude,
   longitude  = excluded.longitude,
   city_name  = excluded.city_name,
   city_code  = excluded.city_code,
   temperature= excluded.temperature,
   humidity   = excluded.humidity,
   uv_index   = excluded.uv_index,
   wind_speed = excluded.wind_speed,
   wind_dir   = excluded.wind_dir,
   wind_gust  = excluded.wind_gust,
   weathercode= excluded.weathercode,
   pressure   = excluded.pressure,
   sunrise    = excluded.sunrise,
   sunset     = excluded.sunset;
`;

return msg;        // ‚Üí SQLite

name: INSERT_OPEN_WEATHER_FORCAST
WEATHER MONITORING FUN
WEATHER MONITORING FUNC
parse+dEdupe
SQL + alert logic
function 26
function 38
func:
/**************************************************************************
 * usgs_parse ‚Üí produces one UPSERT per quake
 *  output[0] : {topic: SQL}  ‚Üí sqlite node
 *  output[1] : (reserved for future alerts)  (leave unwired for now)
 **************************************************************************/

const outToSQLite = 0;

const raw = (typeof msg.payload === 'string')
    ? JSON.parse(msg.payload || '{}')
    : (msg.payload || {});

(raw.features || []).forEach(f => {
    const p = f.properties;
    const g = f.geometry;

    const quake_id = p.code;                     // unique ID
    const sql = `
INSERT INTO eq_events
  (quake_id, ts_utc, last_update_utc, lat, lon, depth_km,
   magnitude, mag_type, region, ev_type, auth,
   felt, significance, src)
VALUES
  ('${quake_id}',
   '${new Date(p.time).toISOString()}',
   '${new Date(p.updated).toISOString()}',
   ${g.coordinates[1]}, ${g.coordinates[0]}, ${g.coordinates[2]},
   ${p.mag}, '${p.magType}',
   '${p.place.replace(/'/g, "''")}',
   'ke', '${p.net}',
   ${p.felt ?? 'NULL'},
   ${p.sig},
   'usgs')
ON CONFLICT(quake_id) DO UPDATE SET
   last_update_utc = excluded.last_update_utc,
   magnitude       = excluded.magnitude,
   depth_km        = excluded.depth_km,
   region          = excluded.region,
   felt            = excluded.felt,
   significance    = excluded.significance;
`;

    node.send([{ topic: sql }, null]);   // out[0] ‚Üí SQLite
});

return null;    // we already emitted SQL statements

function 13
build SQL
format
url weather
func:
/*************************************************************************
 * get_today_mean  ‚Äì call Open-Meteo daily endpoint, grab mean
 *  IN : msg.lat, msg.lon   (passed from build_sql)
 *  OUT: msg.todayMean      (Number)
 *       msg.rows           (history array for K-means)
 *************************************************************************/

const today = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10);          // YYYY-MM-DD
msg.url =
    `https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast` +
    `?latitude=${msg.lat}&longitude=${msg.lon}` +
    `&start_date=${today}&end_date=${today}` +
    `&daily=temperature_2m_mean&timezone=UTC`;
return msg;
